body:
Just realised that I'm unable to set the starting life during a duel to 20.

The guide lines below the life selection restrict to 1,6,11,16,21,26 and 30
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Unable to set starting life to 20

comments.body: Yeah, this was bugging me too although I think it only applies when running in dev mode. I will take a look.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on June 22, 2014 00:49:26_

Just realised that I'm unable to set the starting life during a duel to 20.

The guide lines below the life selection restrict to 1,6,11,16,21,26 and 30
